sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO notice ( unq , gubun , title , content , hit , rdate , upddate , allview) VALUES ( SEQ_notice_unq.nextval , #gubun# , #title# , #content# , '0' , sysdate , sysdate , #allview# )
sqlMap.select:
SELECT b.* FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, a.* FROM ( SELECT unq , gubun , title , content , hit , rdate , allview , upddate FROM notice
WHERE 1=1
AND $searchCondition$ LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY rdate DESC ) a ) b WHERE rn >= #firstIndex# AND rn <= #lastIndex#
SELECT unq, title, centent, hit, to_char(rdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd')as rdate, upddate, allview FROM notice WHERE unq= '$unq$'
